channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ukraine captures North Korean soldier for first time – but he dies hours later
Utah man accidentally causes avalanche, rescues trapped brother
item.description: The unidentified pair of brothers and their father were snowmobiling on Christmas Eve when the avalanche swept through.

item.title: MAGA Crisis Could Mean There Is No Trump Inauguration on Jan. 20
'Willing to take that risk': Republicans want Trump to have vast control over government spending
Mayor Adams clamps down on overtime fraud for city uniform services following NYPD sex-for-OT scandal

item.title: In states that ban abortion, social safety net programs often fail families
item.description: Tennessee has nearly total abortion ban and a porous safety net for mothers and young children

item.title: Trump again suggests US should own and control Greenland
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is again floating his interest in U.S. ownership of Greenland.

item.title: Another jackpot surpasses $1 billion. Is this the new normal?
FDA wants new testing to detect asbestos in products with talc
item.description: The proposed rule is required under a law passed by Congress last year, and is intended to ensure the safety of makeup and baby powder.

item.title: Relatives of Bashar Assad arrested as they tried to fly out of Lebanon, officials say

item.title: Biden to decide on Nippon Steel acquisition of U.S. Steel

item.title: U.S. sales of Hybrid and electric vehicle continue to lag behind gas-powered vehicles in 2024

item.title: WATCH: Drone owner helps save dog from frozen lake
item.description: Kishan Patel stepped into action, helping police in Parsippany, New Jersey, rescue a 20-month-old sheepadoodle from a snow-covered frozen lake.

item.title: Americans are exhausted by political news. TV ratings and a new AP-NORC poll show they’re tuning out
